==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* ''Pardis Dhyai'' roughly means "garden of meditation."
** ''Pardis'' is the Persian word for a kind of garden &mdash; the word being derived from the same root as the word ''Paradise''.
** ''Dhyai'' is possibly derived from the Sanskrit root {{Lang|mini=1|sa=ध्यै|sa_rm=dhyai|sa_tl=to contemplate, meditate, think of,}} which is related to the Avestan word {{lang|mini=1|ae=𐬛𐬀𐬉𐬥𐬁|ae_rm=daēnā|ae_tl=insight" or "religion.}}
